name: Friends in Low Places
description: Being a murderer has it's benefits, like having a small business ring with all the other "trustworthy" murderers you know. You spawn with a Bazaar coin, which holds no monetary value, but showing it to other cut-throats may be the foundation of a lasting business, or even,  a friendship. After all, only other pilferers, thieves and murderers have a Bazaar coin.
